title: Mexico's Wow! Courses
headline: Mexico's Wow! Courses
description: The PGA and LPGA Tours both visit Mexico this week, so we tip our caps to the supreme scenic south-of-the-border golf spreads, like Jack Nicklaus' Quivira in Cabo San Lucas.
body: The PGA and LPGA Tours both visit Mexico this week, so we tip our caps to the supreme scenic south-of-the-border golf spreads, like Jack Nicklaus' Quivira in Cabo San Lucas.
